title: Successful Full Security Scan Execution
description: Verify that a user can initiate and successfully complete a full system security scan with accurate vulnerability detection and results categorized by severity.

steps.description: Log in to the dashboard
Navigate to the scan initiation section
Select 'Full Scan' option
Start the scan
Verify the scan completes within predefined time limits
Check vulnerability results are categorized by severity (e.g. critical, high, medium, low)
Verify results include network, filesystem, and system update vulnerabilities
Confirm scan results are persistently stored and retrievable

title: Quick Scan Option Functionality
description: Ensure that selecting the quick scan option performs a shortened scan focusing on critical areas with summarized results displayed.

steps.description: Log in to the dashboard
Navigate to scan controls
Select 'Quick Scan' option
Initiate scan
Validate scan runs faster than full scan and completes successfully
Verify vulnerabilities detected focus on most critical components
Confirm results update on the UI with proper categorization

title: Risk Scoring Accuracy and Trend Visualization
description: Validate that the risk assessment component calculates and displays CVSS-inspired risk scores correctly and that trend charts update dynamically based on scan data.

steps.description: Complete a system scan with known vulnerabilities
Navigate to the Risk Dashboard
Verify base, temporal, and environmental risk score components are calculated and combined accurately
Check risk distribution charts correctly reflect vulnerability severities
Validate risk trend graphs update dynamically with new scan data
Ensure that high risk items are clearly highlighted

title: Compliance Framework Selection and Check
description: Test that users can select compliance frameworks and run compliance checks producing accurate scores and gap analysis.

steps.description: Access the Compliance Panel
Select the 'PCI-DSS' compliance framework
Run compliance check against selected framework
Validate the compliance score is calculated based on system scans
Verify detailed gap analysis report lists non-compliant items
Check report can be viewed and downloaded from the UI

title: Guided Remediation Workflow Execution
description: Verify the end-to-end guided remediation process including vulnerability selection, remediation plan review, execution, and rollback on failure.

steps.description: Open the Remediation Wizard
Select multiple vulnerabilities for remediation
Review generated remediation plans based on playbooks
Execute the remediation plan
Verify progress is tracked and displayed in real-time
Validate remediation validation step confirms fixes applied successfully
Simulate remediation failure
Confirm automatic rollback occurs restoring previous system state

title: Real-Time Monitoring Metrics Update and Alerts
description: Ensure real-time system metrics (CPU, memory, disk, network) update every 5 seconds, and alert thresholds trigger visible notifications with sortable process listings.

steps.description: Navigate to the Monitoring Dashboard
Verify CPU, memory, disk, and network metrics update at least every 5 seconds
Trigger an alert by exceeding predefined metric thresholds
Check that alerts are visible and clearly indicated in the UI
Sort process list by CPU usage and verify sorting order

title: Historical Scan Data Persistence and Comparison
description: Validate that historical scan data is stored persistently, trends are analyzable, and side-by-side scan comparison features function properly.

steps.description: Run multiple security scans over time
Navigate to the History Viewer
Check that all previous scan records are retrievable
Validate trend analysis charts accurately reflect changes over time
Select two scans for side-by-side comparison
Ensure comparison view highlights differences in vulnerabilities and risk scores

title: Multi-Format Report Generation and Email Delivery
description: Test report generation in all supported formats with embedded charts and recommendations, and email delivery with correct attachments.

steps.description: Generate security reports in PDF, HTML, JSON, CSV, Excel, and Word formats
Verify each report includes embedded charts and remediation recommendations
Send generated report via email using report email feature
Confirm email is sent successfully with correct report attachments

title: User Interface Cybersecurity Dark Theme Consistency
description: Ensure the UI consistently applies the cybersecurity dark theme including color scheme, fast load times, intuitive navigation, and interactive charts.

steps.description: Launch the web application
Verify UI uses the designated dark background (#0a0e27) with cyber blue, purple, and matrix green accents
Check fast page load times across all core UI views
Validate navigation is intuitive and logical
Confirm interactive charts (risk trends, compliance scores) respond to user input

title: Error Handling for Failed Scan Execution
description: Verify that the system handles scan execution failures gracefully with proper error messages and recovery options.

steps.description: Initiate a system scan with induced backend failure (simulate error)
Observe that user receives an informative error notification
Ensure scan status shows as failed in UI
Check that recovery options such as retry scan are available

title: API Endpoint Security and Input Validation
description: Test that all public API endpoints enforce authentication, validate inputs properly, and return meaningful error codes on invalid requests.

steps.description: Send unauthenticated requests to all major API endpoints
Verify each endpoint responds with appropriate authorization error
Send authenticated requests with invalid input payloads to endpoints such as /api/scan and /api/playbooks/plan
Confirm responses contain input validation error messages and reject invalid data

title: Remediation Rollback Functionality Under Failure
description: Validate that when a remediation step fails during execution, the system rollbacks changes properly and maintains integrity.

steps.description: Trigger remediation execution with controlled failure in remediation playbook
Verify rollback process initiates automatically
Confirm system state is restored to pre-remediation snapshot
Check UI accurately reflects rollback status and final outcome

title: Real-Time Monitoring Stop and Restart
description: Ensure that real-time monitoring can be stopped and restarted reliably without loss of data or performance degradation.

steps.description: Start real-time monitoring through API or UI
Verify real-time metrics are received and updated
Stop the monitoring session
Confirm monitoring data updates cease
Restart monitoring
Verify metrics resume updating correctly

title: Multi-OS Vulnerability Detection Coverage
description: Test that vulnerability scanners use platform-specific checks for both Linux and Windows and detect relevant misconfigurations and outdated software.

steps.description: Run scans on Linux system
Verify detection of SSH misconfiguration, firewall status, permissions
Run scans on Windows system
Verify detection of Windows firewall settings and outdated updates

title: Report Generation Load and Performance
description: Validate report generation handles large scan datasets without performance degradation or crashes across all formats.

steps.description: Generate reports for scan containing a large number of vulnerabilities (1000+ records)
Confirm reports complete generation without errors
Measure generation time and verify it is within acceptable performance thresholds
Validate all report formats correctly include charts and content
